effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional
damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack
never misses.
